website_summaries.verdict: A handy and versatile 8-piece set of stainless steel pedicure tools.
pros: Besides the specialized cutter with a curved blade, this kit contains an ingrown toenail corrector that helps get your nails growing over the skin instead of into it
The clippers feature a convenient removable shield that helps prevent toenail spatter after they have been clipped
cons: The included toenail corrector tool can be hard to use and is not as durable as the rest of the pieces in the kit

customer_reviews.title: Finally got a painful ingrown toenail out
customer_reviews.text: I want yall to know. I dont leave reviews. I've had an ingrown toenail stuck good for about 2 years now. Pain level 10 of 10 easy. This kit came in today and I used the nail puller (torture looking device). After about 2 mins of slow pulling and a little pain it popped out. Honestly I was shocked. 100% works when nothing else would. High quality stuff with great packaging. Trust me it's worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ross Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good to use.
customer_reviews.text: I've been suffering from ingrown toenail for years, it's painful but didn't realize i need these tools until i saw it on Amazon, and find it amazing! love the clipper, it's sharp, double side lifter is easy to clean my toenail corner. The nail corrector is really a magic tool, looks strange but very useful, I search the tutorial video on Youtube and find it's easy to use. It's really helping me. Package looks beautiful and I think I would buy one set for my mother and father. The ingrown kit include 6pcs items, and very good stainless steel. If you buy them separately, will cost you a lot more. Definitely worth buying!! Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Gyang

customer_reviews.title: Toenail Kit with tiny ingrown toenail spreader
customer_reviews.text: Neat package, most tools appear to be high quality: but tiny toenail spreader came almost completely disassembled as if loose and jostled apart in transit. Parts too tiny for reassembly without special tools. Since my purpose in getting this kit was for the spreader it has rendered it useless for me. Have placed cell to seller but have not heard back.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive must have!
customer_reviews.text: Used this kit along with Dr. Scholl’s ingrown gel and soaking in Epsom salts with tea tree oil to clear up a bad ingrown toenail on my daughter. Good tools, used with caution and slowly each day to gently pull out nail and keep it growing straight. Keeping this kit on hand if it happens again!
customer_reviews.author: HonestMomma

customer_reviews.title: Love the hook-type nail cleaner tool; Quality set
customer_reviews.text: I really love the nail cleaner with ingrown toenail hook lifter. It is designed so that ends can be switched for working right or left sides. The screw-type ingrown toenail lifter does work, with a joint design cleverly executed to manipulate for different positions needed for various toe widths. The box is really high-quality, excellent for gifting or storage if desired, with precision-cut foam to prevent components from rattling. I am pleased with this set as money well-spent.
customer_reviews.author: QuincyAnn

customer_reviews.title: Instructions?
customer_reviews.text: Tools seem similar to what one would see at a salon, but there are no directions whatsoever. The tools are not marked for their specific use and no sanitizing instructions. Of course soaking in alcohol should be sufficient, but I would rather have labels and warnings for errors or misuse just because the average person is untrained in this. If it doesn't work the way I can only guess it should, at what point should I see a doctor before my toe falls off?
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Every little thing you need to painlessly eliminate ingrown toenails!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy metal, easy to clean! When I tell you the quality of the metal is definitely worth more than the given price!!! I LOVE MY SET!
customer_reviews.author: Von

customer_reviews.title: Good product so far.
customer_reviews.text: I was planning in getting a pedicure, but too many factors against it, too expensive, they use the same tools for all customers ( I know they disinfect them, but not enough) so I decided to do my own pedicure, I’m still learning to use these tools, very sharp clippers, the cuticle pusher and remover works awesome. Just make sure to soak your feet for 15 minutes or more, I would recommend to get some like pumice scrubs, nail filer and a buffer block, to add smoothness to your toenails, moisturize feet with coconut oil after and Enjoy your clean feet.
customer_reviews.author: Diana P

customer_reviews.title: Poorly done
customer_reviews.text: Looked great when at first but all of the gadgets seem either poorly made or too big. The clippers were soooo sharp yet too thick to get in the corners/crevices of the nails safely. The long pick is also super thick and hurts to scrape under the nail. I cut myself so easily! Also, No booklet or directions were provided on how to use each tool or to even describe the names of them. My family thought it came from home depot. Poorly done.
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: 10+ year ingrown toenail was fixed and now grows correctly
customer_reviews.text: Only bad thing is that the ingrown toenail corrector is a little unstable. The thing thay pushes on your toenail comes off pretty easily after a few uses (I don't know if it's supposed to), but all you have to do is hold it in place so it's an easy fix. Before and after pictures will be added.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: instructions would have been nice
customer_reviews.text: The product is great and works very well, but it didn't come with any instructions. The most helpful tool looked like a wine opener, I had no idea what to do with it. Once I watched YouTube to figure out how to use it, I love it. The tool that looks like a dental tool, is great for shoving a tiny piece of cotton in the space created by the "wine opener". I had instant relief. This is a great product - very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: so if you have small toes...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend's ingrown toenails. but shes pretty short and petite and her toes are quite small. It turns out, that this in fact wont work on her toes because her toenails are not wide enough to fit the extractor device thing. it seems like it works fine on my toes and her bigger toes but if you have small feet this probably wont actually work on you. You'll also need to grow out your nails a little bit if you really want it to be able to take hold of your nails, so youll need to live with some of the pain for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: influence peddler

customer_reviews.title: Ingrown toenail correcter arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I primarily ordered this to deal with ingrown toenails on my big toes, but ingrown toenail correcter arrived broken with the screw part snapped off within the device, rendering it unusable Besides that, the ingrown toenail cutter, although large and sturdy, has a head shape that makes it unwieldy for it's intended purpose compared to a previous similar product I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Sinai Alia

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap crap....
customer_reviews.text: Well put together. Best deal in town. Buy now...jud to have. Very well engineered. Not cheap feeling at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence S. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: The right tools for the right job!
customer_reviews.text: I had a toenail begin to become ingrown and I tried using some things we had around the bathroom to get it out. I wasn’t getting the job done and just hurting my toe more. I got these pretty quick from Amazon Prime and put the tools to work right away. The tools look and feel quality. They have that little heft to them that keeps you from thinking they are cheap. I only used the pedicure tool and clippers. But having the right tools for the job made the removal quick and easy. I am thanking God for the relief!
customer_reviews.author: CasaDeTrevino

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use if you don't have big extra-strong hands
customer_reviews.text: Not what you need if you want effective and easy to use. The nippers were too large, the spring mechanism too tight to properly control with confidence. Such a sharp gadget needs to be designed to use and control easily. The cuticle pusher is very wide - too wide for most nails. The angled end is also not very effective, as it's edge is too thick. The file is useless, period. The only thing useable was the ingrown toenail side edge tool, but it, too, isn't the best. I really wanted to like this, but after trying for 3 weeks, this is not what I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: WS

customer_reviews.title: This is the set you must have
customer_reviews.text: These are great heavyweight utensils. A good complete set for every pedicure need/issue possible. Side note, when using the utensil to lift out ingrown nail don't twist too much at first because you risk cracking your nail. A little bit at a time over several uses is best. Getting a second set.
customer_reviews.author: S.Shev

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my ingrown big toenails, and it worked. Soak your feet to soften the nail, put on the clamp and tighten to lift the nail edges, then dry it and remove. I'm happy with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Doughnot

customer_reviews.title: Ingrown nails are gone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set two months ago and it’s already been three weeks without any pain at all, I am already wearing those shoes that used to bother me a lot. I wasn’t doing it daily but often after taking a shower, opened the nail, applying a drop of essential oil on a piece of cotton and placing it under the nail (oil helped with the pain). Very helpful tool, I didn’t even know it existed. I got one for my mom too and I’m getting another one for my sister. Fully recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have a whole lot of expectations but I love it. Packaged beautiful and I make a little spa day out of it when I'm using them. The one thing I would have liked is more instructions. As a guy, I don't know a whole lot about how to use all the tools, so I tried to look it up but couldn't find as much information as I wanted. Still a great product though!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, but the scissors have a problem.
customer_reviews.text: These stainless steel tools are solid and well-made, but the scissors have one major design flaw: the curved handles are too smooth and slippery to hold securely. Having a secure grip is important with this sharp, pointy tool. The handles need a texture etched into them or a grippy covering to make them safe to use. All the tools in the set are very well fabricated and high quality. The set comes in a nice box and arrived promptly. Rather than return the set, I am going to try to wrap something grippy like a textured tape on the scissor handles.
customer_reviews.author: rb in columbia, sc

customer_reviews.title: Five star
customer_reviews.text: I started out using the corrector (it was actually kinda fun doing it the 1st time) but in the long run, it was just easier cutting it out with the scissors. I wish I had this kit a long time ago, it gives multiple options so you can find the one best suited to whatever ridiculous situtation your little piggies can throw at ya.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This set was a disappointment. I bought this for the “nipper”. I needed something to cut hangnails and such. This set includes a pair of nail scissors, the angle of which makes it VERY difficult to do what I need. The tweezers have NO grip for me. Three stars for the sturdiness of the set and for the two or three pieces I can actually use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! So glad I found this
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I can't believe how amazing this little contraption is. It took me a little while to get it in my toe after soaking in some water and using this device as instructed, I felt almost INSTANT relief from the pain. It had gotten to the point where my toe was so sensitive out woke me up at night. After I used this, my toe felt so much better. I'll never suffer from ingrown toe nail pain again.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M Betts

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Who knew there was a proper way of ingrown nail extraction?! Got it for my husband and it's a life changer. Good quality tools that are housed in a sleek box for easy storage. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: MDP71017

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Ingrown toenail removal set!
customer_reviews.text: During the pandemic I ended up with ingrown toenails. Of course eveything was closed so I bought this. I will never regret it. It came with everything to not only rid my ingrown toenails but to keep my toenails trimmed and clean all the time. This set truly saved my little toes. I like the box it's in so nothing gets lost. And the clippes are a magnet to catch droppings with a plastic sheild. The instructions for each peice were thorough and I'm so happy to have this.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Flareau

customer_reviews.title: Great tools to correct ingrown toenail, with sturdy craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: So far its been great. All the tools feel pretty solid. I wasnt quite sold on the toenail corrector because it looked like torture device, as many have mentioned, but with a painful ingrown toe nail that curve downward on the right side and seemed to be getting worse...I had to try. Usually, I had to dig into that side to be able to cut the sharp edge, very dangerous and painful. After 2 times of using the corrector... no more pain. I can finally cut it easily properly as well, since it has the normal curvature a nail should have. The other tools are great to help with that process and for basic pedicure stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Wrath502

customer_reviews.title: Wow...Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that I was impressed right from opening the package. For the price, you're getting a lot. After using the cutters, I was further impressed as it was extremely sharp and will not create a burr where it cuts the nail. I have an issue with in-grown nails and the tool does help. Just remember to shower or warm up your nail first or else it'll hurt more. After heating, your nail will soften and will help to re-shapen and reduce pain from the in-grown nail.
customer_reviews.author: supafreeza

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Shocked at the price. The high quality clippers alone would normally run you about 10 bucks. This is a great buy. Top notch tools. The only issue is with the Nail Corrector. Saying it is painless is a bit much lol. It doesn't "hurt" but there is some very minor pain/moderate discomfort present. Also, it is more suited as a nail straightener than an ingrown corrector seeings how it has to connect to the edge of the nail. Regardless, this is a must buy for those that take care of their feet. These tools can also be used for toenail maintenance as well; not just ingrown nails.
customer_reviews.author: Super Mario

customer_reviews.title: Cheap waste of money
customer_reviews.text: So I probably should just go see a podiatrist, however with a high deductible I thought I would give this a try, after all I am a seasoned nurse. Wrong, the instrument that you are suppose to use on the toe and smush it down, is so cheap and flimsy that it broke when I took it out of the box. Determined to fix it I tried everything, at one point when I finally got it place and went to tighten down the base flew off and the screw almost went through my toe. The instructions are vague at best. Best advice go see a doctor!
customer_reviews.author: Tia McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful tools to clip and file smooth the side toe nail
customer_reviews.text: ‘Just what I needed. My pedicurist still does a much better job than me but this kit helped has helped me keep my toe nails from growing back under in between visits. We are correcting some ingrown toe nails that resulted from putting my non-pointy feet into very pointy toed heels. The shoes were really expensive & gorgeous ...but so not worth the resulting foot pain. I’ve since learned my lesson & donated them...
customer_reviews.author: diane parman

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful for stubborn ingrowns! 😁
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my boyfriend since he suffered with an ingrown toenail on his big toe for about a year already. His ingrown has prevented him from walking correctly and caused him to limp from the pain of the ingrown. He was excited after I showed him the tool set and right away used it. He successfully took out the nail piece that was bugging him for so long and can finally walk again! I’m so relieved that he feels so much better now! ☺️ All tools were included in the set and it was a great price as well!
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Perez

customer_reviews.title: Oversized
customer_reviews.text: This set is made for a sasquatch's feet. The pieces are so thick, that you can't clean, or file the sides of the nails. I don't know of anyone with toenails so large, that this set would be useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set that has everything you need to rid yourself of or prevent ingrown nails. I bought this for a friend who struggles with ingrown nails a lot. The nail correcting tool works so well and is really very simple to use. It comes with easy to understand instructions with pictures which was helpful. This set is worth every penny! Don't keep suffering, try it now!
customer_reviews.author: amys

customer_reviews.title: Use Common Sense When Purchasing
customer_reviews.text: If you have an infected toenail, puss and swollen, please don't attempt to remove it at home. You need antibiotics and most likely need it cut out which is incredibly painful at times... this kit is good if you have a manageable (early on) ingrown. Soaking the toenail in warm water first and then trying to lift the nail a little each day.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea

customer_reviews.title: Terrible DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Very Misleading. The appliances I received were so thick you cannot really do any thing with your feet. They are too thick, Do not waste your money on this product!
customer_reviews.author: CHERYL

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this type of product for years, but finally got tired of being in pain every time someone bumped my toe. I wish I hadn't waited because this worked perfectly for my ingrown big toenail! I soaked my foot then applied the tool. I've done it once, it's been over a month, and I'm still pain free!!
customer_reviews.author: Age

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Had been looking for this kit for along time but obviously in the wrong place! I had seen the items sold separately but more than what I wanted to pay. Happy w my purchase. Recommend to everyone! Doing your own pedicures will prevent “toe fungus” from these Nail salons that don’t sanitize like they should!!
customer_reviews.author: northa w sanchez

customer_reviews.title: A gift that pleased and helped!
customer_reviews.text: The Bcabo in-grown toe nail 6 piece set was far better than I expected with nice packaging, sturdy metals and feel. It was purchased for my house guest who has struggled with his toe nails for years. He said it gave him the best tools to help him that he has ever had! So pleased it helps him!
customer_reviews.author: Deus est

customer_reviews.title: Items are of different finish, had scuff marks, didnt look clean
customer_reviews.text: Items did not at all reflect the look and finish posted on the site. Furthermore, the scissor like tool had some dark wear marks, which did not invoke confidence. It looked more like a rainbow of silver/metallic colors vs. a clean set
customer_reviews.author: Florencio Carlos

customer_reviews.title: walking pain free!!
customer_reviews.text: would be 5 stars if the pick tool was thinner. it's just a little tough to get it behind the nail and pull it out. other issue is the nail file thing it came with. very thick not very abrasive. the kit also did not include any instructions or best practices. but everything else is great and very much worth the money. i am going to buy one of these for my mom as well.
customer_reviews.author: Omnitouch1

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best product I have bought off of amazon after purchasing hundreds of items. I had a stubborn ingrown nail for about 2 months and after receiving this product it took about 3 minutes and a bit of pain but the nail has not get better in years. I would buy again. Nice packaging cool storage kit and excellent value for your money
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Quality Nail Tools
customer_reviews.text: Periodically deal with ingrown toenails. The set of tools was surprisingly high quality for the price. The nail cutter in particular cuts smoothly and evenly. The small picks are sturdy but thin enough to easily insert under the nail. Top notch set of tools.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: CHRONIC INGROWN LIFESAVER
customer_reviews.text: I have had TWO separate foot surgeries to remove my ingrowns, and they have grown back. I'm a student nurse, so I am supposed to be on my feet all day, but ingrowns make it painful as heck. My nail techs would hold up my removed ingrowns like trophies for other nail techs to look at, so yeah, mine are gnarly. This set finally did something miraculous! I was able to remove the ingrowns and impacted dry skin under them with ease. So happy to finally manage my ingrowns without going to the nail salon every month!
customer_reviews.author: Jessnicole558

customer_reviews.title: double check the ingrown toenail corrector.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in August and just got around to using it. Quite disappointed to find the ingrown toenail corrector broken. The middle fulcrum nut was upside down and the screw was actually broken off in the nut. It’s useless and now I cannot return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Richard

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this because it was so cheaply made, and very hard to use. Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Edythe Sonder

customer_reviews.title: Easy and safe to use. Soak your foot first!
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from ingrown nails my whole life. With a good salt water soak first this kit is the easiest to use as well as least painful thing I have ever used to extract a nail. Min grown in the sides not the top so the straightening tool is my favorite thing ever. You can feel instant relief the moment the pressure is gone.
customer_reviews.author: trevor jones

customer_reviews.title: Great set and good for removing ingrown toenails
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't go to get my toenails done during the lockdowns. I ordered this it because I get bad ingrown toenails on my big toes. I used the tools to remove the ingrown nails and it worked great. Best to soak your feet to get the nails soft before clipping.
customer_reviews.author: TxGal4Ever

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice tools!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I didn't expect such great quality 👌. This set looks very professional and the ingrown toenail contraption works wonders. Covid-19 forced this purchase and I'm very impressed by these tools. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: StarkA

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Smancy
customer_reviews.text: This came in a lovely box. This is a great gift for people with ingrown toe nails. I would stay away from giving to children because these tools are very sharp. They did not skimp on materials. I expect this will be a welcomed asset to the care of my lovely toes for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: WinSoms

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I have ingrowns on both big toes. ): But once I got this kit, I was able to relieve my toes. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: ZoesMama

customer_reviews.title: Good nail kit
customer_reviews.text: Most of the items in this toolkit are invaluable and sturdy and pretty easy to use. The nail corrector is hard to fit properly at first, and you may need another person who can get a better angle on your nail than you can.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Valuable Tools for Ingrown Toenails
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks of use, the Bcabo kit has been very helpful in flattening my right big toe's ingrown toenail. In addition, it helped relieve the pain I was experiencing when I trimmed off the outer corner of the toenail.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Incredible find
customer_reviews.text: This tool is a lifesaver. Incredible value for the price. The tools are well made and sturdy. The ingrown nail pick/clean out tool is awesome. This was the easiest and most pain free ingrown toenail removal I have ever done. Definitely worth the money. I recommend this to anyone, whether you have problem nails or not.
customer_reviews.author: bjk312

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: I should have a grooves in the bottom part of the the spreader because there’s nothing there and I can’t do anything with it and I’m trying to figure out how it works and I read the instructions three times is there anybody that could help me?
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this set is amazing given the price. As noted in other reviews, it's a shame there are no instruction included, but since directions are available elsewhere, it's really no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: You know what this is for so I will not get graphic... This set is great and has all the necessary tools to really dig in there and get it out... You won't be disappointed with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Gomaan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tools right here. Really sharp. Only thing I would say would be great to add to it, might be some instructions. Or a link to a website to see some instructions on how to use all of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Shaw

customer_reviews.title: To be honest
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got no clue how this works. I have ingrown toenails on both my big toes and I have no idea what to do with this kit to fix them. No instructions but you get a whole kit of tools if you know what to do with them then go for it
customer_reviews.author: User739156420

customer_reviews.title: Tool kit
customer_reviews.text: So far the tools on the kit work and appear to be of good quality with the exception of the ingrown nail tool. This tool is flimsy and doesn't really work
customer_reviews.author: Glendalys

customer_reviews.title: Good tools
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with ingrown toe nails. I get pedicures and nothing helps. I have to wear steel toed boots at work. I use just the tool about once a week and have not had a problem since.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Matchett

customer_reviews.title: Nice took set
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I purchased this week for the cuticle pusher and the tonsil clamp. Everything is great and easy to use except the clamp. I haven't messed with it a whole lot but it's definitely finicky.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel sizemore

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Nail Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice functional nail trimming set at a great price. The attachment for removing ingrown toenails is difficult to use but I can think it would work with some one assisting you. I couldn't do it by myself. I also like the storage kit it was sent in.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Ok I have to say I was honestly petrified to use to this, but after the first time I kinda got over it. The thing that looks like a corkscrew was a little difficult to use, I was able to find videos on YouTube. For the pricing though you can’t go wrong. I’ve been to the foot doctor and had toe nails removed and that is far more expensive, but you can use this as a preventative.
customer_reviews.author: Christins Dority

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, rusted easy & quickly!
customer_reviews.text: They looked a little discolored when received, and immediately started to show signs of rust. I had to disinfect the tools as I do everything else prior to use and shortly after looked rusty. Unfortunately, they give you a short period of time to return the items so it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: Professional equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Set is sturdy. Looks nice. Mostly works well. I still haven't gotten the hang of the nail straightener. The other equipment took care of most of th problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I liked the set very much, don't quite get the "ingrown toe nail" gadget. Presently don't have to use it so can't evaluate. All in all it's a good set and well priced.
customer_reviews.author: gears

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: If you know what you are doing then this product is the best I've found. All stainless steel so it's sturdy and easy to clean/disinfect. Has all the tools you need for the job at hand. Only downside is there is no carry case for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this little kit! It has all the essentials. Easy to use on your own. Especially with COVID-19 I am able to give myself some great pedicures and remove my ingrown nails without having to visit the nail salon. In love!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t add unusable items in kit.
customer_reviews.text: Only part that I disliked was the little piece of plastic that had magnet on it was basically unusable and should just be discontinued. It makes it almost impossible to use the clippers. So in reality you have a 5 piece set.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Gonshorowski

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret
customer_reviews.text: This item is very much worth the money. The quality of the product is amazing real metal not metal plated plastic. Had everything I needed to treat my ingrown toenail and am buying another set for everyone in my family it's great love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rare9%

customer_reviews.title: No instructions.
customer_reviews.text: The tools were fine, I believe, but the kit came with no instructions. I couldn't figure out how to use the spreader. Without knowing, it's useless.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Work

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: This package is extremely useful but the quality is not that great. Some of the tools are made badly have sharp ages. But in general good enough for the value you pay.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Good kit and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a very pretty little box so its easy to keep all together. Its good quality. I am very happy with my purchase . The little piece for ingrown nails works wonderful once you het the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: raquel lima

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, has worked well for me.
customer_reviews.text: They work really well, very well made, worth the money and can be used for more than just nails. Used mine to take out a suture that the doctor missed taking out.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Edelen

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to order this because I needed a mani/pedi and prefer to do it myself. The nippers were extremely sharp and pointy I did not like them at all. Even without applying much pressure it cut through the nail and skin. The other tools were ok. The price is good for it, you pay little and you get cheap products basically no ones fault but my own, I should have payed a little more for quality products.
customer_reviews.author: VanessaE-B

customer_reviews.title: Vary well made.
customer_reviews.text: If you have thick ass toe nails, these clippers are great. Great quality. I bet you if I ever need to buy another set, it'll be because I lost this set, not because anything broke lol.
customer_reviews.author: Zforzombie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Toenail care kit.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the quality of Toenail Kit. For the price I didn’t expect the tools to be so sturdy. A perfect set of tools for ingrown nails or regular foot care. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and a good set overall... the little screw nail lifter broke day one but that's ok the other tools are very useful. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: rababymamma

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for professional tools this is not it.
customer_reviews.text: One of the tools came with a crack on it. The package itself arrived quickly. Clippers not as sharp as I would have liked-about the same strengh and sharpness as a regular nail clipper.
customer_reviews.author: eaglesfan

customer_reviews.title: Toes maintenance
customer_reviews.text: A great tool to have to keep your toenails in good condition. Just make sure to bathe it in alcohol before and after to keep it sterilized.
customer_reviews.author: J. A.

customer_reviews.title: You need to be flexible, doesn't work with painful ingrown nails
customer_reviews.text: If you can touch your toes for long periods of time then yeah I guess it works. If you have somewhat severe ingrown nails then forget about you, save your money and go to the podiatrist.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the nail cleaning tool, that big "scissor", and the cubicle pusher. It's sturdy when I clip my big toenail and the tools does it's job
customer_reviews.author: devil_fruit

customer_reviews.title: Toenail adjuster broke upon initial use.
customer_reviews.text: The Nail clippers broke after two uses. I bought this for my daughter bc she’s diabetic and prone to ingrown toenails.....the toenail device broke the first time we tried using it. Poorly made of damaged during shipping not sure what the issue was. I tried contacting the company for a replacement but they never returned my two emails!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: In grow toe nail? GET THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Great utensils to use for my In grown toe nail that I’ve had for 2 years. Feels so much better. Took some time to understand how to use but worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Corrected ingrown toenail
customer_reviews.text: This worked out great to help with correcting ingrown toenails. I used twice a day for a week to 2 weeks after soaking feet in water, organic apple cider vinegar, hydrogen peroxide and Epsom salt for 15 minutes. Placed qtip pieces to separate toenail from skin as well.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tools
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality, almost industrial feel to them. Still had some manufacturing carbon marks on them that I washed off with alcohol when sterilizing. The ingrown toenail straightening tool seems a little cheaply made, so if you are buying just for that tool, I might look to another set. Overall, happy with the set and purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. All of the tools are good quality and you get a nice selection of different tools. The toenail device is amazing and really works to straighten the nail. Its temporary but the relief is immediate.
customer_reviews.author: Megan B

customer_reviews.title: Does what's advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've had ingrown nails since I was a kid and everytime I had to cut them it ended up in lots of blood and tears. I was surprised at how easy and painless I could do it with this set, all the pieces seem to be sturdy and good quality. I've only use the corrector twice so I still don't know but I think it's gonna work
customer_reviews.author: JanHer

customer_reviews.title: Ingrown toenail
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help fix a pincer/ingrown toenail. A little hard to get the mechanics of it down, but does the trick when you get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t figure it all out!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is a sturdy set, but I still can’t figure out how to use it. My advice for the novice is go get a pedicure!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I'm.not easy to please. I was skeptical about this product but this ingrown toenail had been killing me for more than two week. I received it today. I soaked my foot in very warm water got the tools out and within 2 mins got the ingrown toenail out! What a relief! I highly recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynlee Feucht

customer_reviews.title: Best kit, well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The best nail kit , I have owned or used. You will not be disappointed in this product. I will buy again for my family.
customer_reviews.author: john wall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: As described! Tools came and are of great quality. Excellent storage case to keep everything all together! I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality set with great tool for treating in-grown toenails.
customer_reviews.text: Well-made set with a good variety of tools. The little gadget for pulling up the sides of in-grown toenails to trim or medicate them is wonderful! I’d never seen one before and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: I love the case it comes in that was nice. On time everything A-Ok thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lambchop60

customer_reviews.title: I returned it
customer_reviews.text: The tool to stretch the ingrown toenail was extremely hard to use. It kept falling apart. The other tools are great
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: No more ingrown nails
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son in law and he loves it , he suffers with ingrown nails a lot , he says this has all but eliminated them
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Ingrown Toenail  remedy
customer_reviews.text: This kit resolved a 10-year long problem...follow the directions and this will resolve ingrown nails.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: FA on the go
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the ingrown tow nail tool. And used it for a few weeks. Haven’t had any problems. I did have to get someone to help me put it on.
customer_reviews.author: M.Gomez

product_meta.title: Bcabo Upgraded 8Pcs/set Ingrown Toenail Tools Kit, Premium Nail Treatment Foot Tool, Ingrown Toenail Removal Correction Clippers, Surgery Grade Ingrown Toe Nail File Lifter, Professional Pedicure Tool
product_meta.description:
Many people suffering the pain of ingrown toenail, they think it's just a small problem. However,it will not recovery if you ignore it, and will cause many big problems, such as:

1. The pain of onyxis make people facial expression distortion, movement distortion when people walking and playing sports, will destroy person's temperament；

2. Nail will got inflammation repeated , easy to cause abscess, lead to nail root rot;

3. It will cause toenail serious deformation, nail loss and foot odor;

4. It can lead to a decrease in immunity of fingernails and infection of fungal diseases, such as onychomycosis.

I recommend this bcabo ingrown toenail set to treat DIY.




How to use?

1. Soak feet for 15 minutes with warm water;

2. Disinfect toenails, fingernails and tools;

3. Hook both sides of the ingrown toenail with the two hooks on the tool;

4. Use one hand hold the middle fulcrum of the tool, twisting the nut to fix the tool on the toenail with the other hand. (Fulcrum towards two directions for different sizes of the nails, you can find somebody to help you);

5. Slowly intensify till there is a sense of expansion (no pain). Intensify slightly for every 10 minutes;

6. Take your feet out of the water after 30 minutes, wait for 15 minutes to make your feet dry;

7. Remove the equipment, the toenail is reshaped, you can fill some medical cottons under the tilted nails to prevent rebound.








Features:

Material: Premium stainless steel

Bcabo focus on foot health for 5 years and try our best to support high quality products.








Package Including:

1*Nail Nipper

1*Nail Lifter

1*Nail File

1*Nail Pusher

1*Tweezers

1*Acne needle

1*Toenail Corrector

1*Nail Cover

1*User Manual
feature_bullets: Home Treatment for Ingrown Toenail: With user manual inside. Professional pedicure set adopt lever mechanics to change the angle of nail growth, provide a great care for your nails to keep nail healthy, you can relief the outgrow of toenails by yourself. (For patients who have severe ingrown toenails, professional treatment is recommended,don't correct it by yourself);
Premium Material: These professional pedicure tools are made of surgical grade stainless steel with polishing finished. easy to use, rust-proof, water-proof, corrosion-resistant and easy to sanitize;
Prevent The Further Infection: Double sized nail lifter can clean the dirt under toenail, lifts toenail, keep nails neatly, prevent future ingrown infection and toenail pain;

Ingrown Toenail Corrector: Toenail corrector adopts lever mechanics to change the angle of nail growth, then the nail will become flattened and widened and not grow inside toenail. You can adjust the sides of the corrector to adapt different nail;

Nail Clipper&File: Special long curved blade can help you clean up the wound, toe removal, powerful and sharp clipper cleanly and smoothly cuts ingrown toenails or thick nail. File can make your nails smoothly after treatment.
